endTime.description: End of time interval, in variety of formats, e.g. 11:30, see https://www.scalyr.com/help/time-reference

query.description: Query to execute in PowerQuery language

startTime.description: Start of time interval, in variety of formats, e.g. 10:30, see https://www.scalyr.com/help/time-reference

token.description: API token, that overrides the one provided by the config.yaml
